name: Revolt
description: Revolt is a 3D dual stick shooter set in the future, where a devastating virus has wiped out most of humanity, and machines have risen up to exterminate the remains of the population. You must take control of Guy, a resistance fighter who has infiltrated into enemy territory, to battle against the robotic hordes and blast through a...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Storage: 250 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Revolt is a pretty good twin stick shooter game, it works great with controller and It was pretty fun.

Steam really really REALLY needs a section, seperate from the main store page (like the Software section), to host and, otherwise, corral amateur developers  I would comment on what immediately frustrated me about this game but it's so obvious that  I'm wondering if it was designed intentionally for the sake of getting reactions.
